title: #263: My Daughter Kirby Brown - Profiling The "Guru", Part 3
description:
Laura Richards, Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti talk with Ginny Brown whose daughter, Kirby Brown, died at a New Age "Spiritual Warrior" retreat led by JAR in Sedona Arizona.

James Shore and Liz Neuman also died at the same event. Ginny talks about her daughter Kirby's zest for life, the day her life changed forever, the impact on family and friends, the ongoing battle she is fighting to ensure accountability and safety. Laura and Jim discuss whether this was a cult.


 

Please read the book The Sweet Life: How We Lived After Kirby Died by Ginny Brown and Jean Brown.

 

https://www.amazon.com/dp/0578708795/ref=cm_sw_r_tw_dp_x_Bsm.Eb8H07NED via @amazon

 

#HerNameWasKirbyBrown

#HerNameWasLizNeuman

#HisNameWasJamesShore
